title: A Farmers life got a bit better with new outfits to keep us warm this winter.

tasks.task: Conducting a Daily Farming Routine in Farmers Life
subtasks: Checking game status and ensuring character is awake
Organizing work tasks and equipment layout
Watering and checking on plants (mushrooms, berries)
Feeding and cleaning animals (chickens, cows, pigs)
Managing livestock enclosures and quarrantines (brushing, deworming)
Collecting and distributing manure for fertilizer
Processing surplus produce (applying moonshine to berries, cooking ham)
Operating machinery (tile repair shed, sharing system)
Installing new structures (chicken coop, pigsty) and maintaining existing structures
Crafting and repairing tools and equipment
Trading goods with NPCs  (selling mongrel eggs, buying stilled or hunting supplies)
Exploring for resources (berries, mushrooms, wood) and managing hunt boundaries
Processing raw materials into sellable products (mash, cord)
Storing and organizing items within the barns and living spaces
Completing maintenance tasks (cleaning interiors, resupplying essentials)
Planning and anticipating tasks for upcoming seasons (winter preparations)
